column3:
We already get the message

```
2014-05-28 07:07:28 UpdateTip: new best=000000000000000004ba6752f1ce5f70e28c494325bd7620602d05a469a256ef  height=302985  log2_work=78.846423  tx=39632548  date=2014-05-28 07:06:38 progress=0.999998
```

for each block, making it more spammy doesn't seem useful to me. If you want more spam, just enable the net debug category.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p3739_6047965213be126cfab50c163fa5005b30507002/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
NACK. No need for more spam by default.\n
